p.s: The article Is the usefulness of unions coming to an end? sThe answer is yes written by Brian Pollard and published in The Gulf News on 24 November, 2011 mentions that the unions do not protect the workers rights anymore (l. 5-6).

The author says that unions were the best thing that happened to the labour movement because unions were successful in giving a better working environment and a higher wage to to the workers (l. 1-4).
He thinks that unions are more about power and greed now.
Unions are not required to make the workers feels safe anymore since the laws as well as our moral values decide and regulate these factors (l. 7-9).
Another thing that the author points out is that the unions are against the competition between companies (l. 10-11).
Their products or services are also a lot more expensive that cheaper competitors can easily take their place (l. 13).

The author says that nowadays employers are being exploited by employees and the fact that unions have become more powerful than their employers createscreate an unhealthy business environment (l. 17-19).
Lastly he mentions that the unions are at fault when it comes to the economic mess the world is in (l. 21-23).
